title: Should I buy SGU?
body:
Hey guys!
So I'm getting some Rp this arvo and was wondering if I should get SGU? I've been playing udyr a lot lately (godyr guinsoos for the win!) and really like the look of his ultimate skin. I already own the other 2 ultimate skins, and enjoy PFE way more than DJ sona. This isn't because DJ sona is bad, it's just that I really enjoy the feel of PFE. Anyway, I've only really bought the ultimate skins, as I don't really buy RP much. Should I buy SGU? Should I wait for the next ultimate skin to come out? (Unkown champ)


Thanks!

Comment below {{champion:77}}

replies.body: Save your moneys and buy someone you appreciate a gift. You'll make them happy and that is more important and rewarding than lining ritos pockets for something you'll never be able to trade or share with someone else.

If you like him enough, sure. He's META right now so it's a good time to get him, but he'll probably get a few nerfs in the not-too-distant future, cos Rito.

(fyi after they nerf Runic Echo Phoenix Udyr, IBG BC Tiger Stance Udyr is also really strong in this meta)
leave it to a trick2g fanboy to assume everyone knows what SGU means

Definitely Not Udyr is an AMAZING skin. Spirit Guard is very nice too, but it depends on you! 

If you like all of the intricate things within the skin such as the emotes and quotes along with the particle/aesthetic look then I'd say go for it! If you haven't seen all the details check out this [Skin Spotlight!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z0APrGg6EqI) (You can also search for any other skin you're considering here for a full look at it!)

If you're more in the mood for a gimicky and funny skin to play around with I'd recommend the Definitely not Udyr! Nothing like running round in various onesies bear slapping the hell outta people! [(Skin Spotlight for DNU)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NlwjlUmaR_g)

Actually forgot to mention, I own defiantly not udyr... XD 

Got from a mystery gift
i was thinking SGU = StarGate Universe XDDDD
Don't waste money on a game.

Please don't be negative like this, while it is your own opinion to not spend money on a game, some people like the idea of having something fancy.

Rito do need the money to survive after all.
If you didn't think SGU meant Star Gate Universe you're all too young.

SGU is a super cool skin, but I personally pref [definitely not udyr](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NlwjlUmaR_g) :3 (Also if you go for this path then you have money to go towards the next ultimate skin)

Gift me SGU? :P
I think he is a really good champ and he is strong at the moment and always fun so go for it!
